fields.Title: THOUGHT / GOSSAMER STATE
fields.Description: Savoir Faire convinces you on the merits of being an Ultraliberal -- Gossamer State.

fields.Title: START
input
You: "Can't say I didn't make that Siilen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Can't say I didn't make that Siileng guy give some of his money either.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Wasn't *easy* getting that giant no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wasn't *easy* getting that giant novelty cheque from Evrart. Took some ingenuity to get into the harbour, but you got in -- and you *took* that bribe as hard as any cop's taken it.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "That's right. You work harder than..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's right. You work harder than *anyone*, you almost rode yourself to the grave and you're still practically a *hobo* -- why is that?

fields.Title: You: "Fucking taxes, man."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fucking taxes, man.

fields.Title: You: "What hard work do I do exactly?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What hard work do I do exactly?

fields.Title: You: "I'm not sure I *ride*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm not sure I *ride*...

fields.Title: You: "Sure, and I got that giant novelty..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sure, and I got that giant novelty cheque from Evrart...

fields.Title: You: "The system is broken!"
fields.Dialogue Text: The system is broken!

fields.Title: You: "Yeah, and Evrart gave me that fiver..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, and Evrart gave me that fiver."

fields.Title: You: "Oh, and then there's pawning stuff..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, and then there's pawning stuff off to that suspicious Roy guy.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "You didn't log that in as a donatio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You didn't log that in as a donation either -- you don't log any of that shit in, you're a straight rider.

fields.Title: You: "NO FUCKING WAY. I guess I'm a free..."
fields.Dialogue Text: NO FUCKING WAY. I guess I'm a free market fundamentalist now. (Opt in.)

fields.Title: You: "Well... if *not* being an ultralibe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Well... if *not* being an ultraliberal makes me a racist then I guess I should be an ultraliberal? (Opt in.)

fields.Title: You: "Go away! [Discard thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Go away! [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Oh yeah! Like a horse. A work horse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh yeah! Like a horse. A work horse. For hard work.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "It ain't easy, but you *do* it. Day..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It ain't easy, but you *do* it. Day in and day out. You didn't make the rules but you won't lose! You're a cop and a sprinter and a money printer.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "That's just what it's like -- life..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's just what it's like -- life and death. But you got *gills* on your side, baby, got those black papers with the faces of the innocences on them -- you bring in the Franconegros and the Solas.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "NINETY-EIGHT PERCENT OF ALL YOUR MO..."
fields.Dialogue Text: NINETY-EIGHT PERCENT OF ALL YOUR MONEY.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Every time you wipe your ass! They..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Every time you wipe your ass! They got their direct and their *indirect modes of taxation*: sales tax, excise duty, extraction tax, alimony, one tax that doesn't even have a name! Plus there's the stuff *people in other countries* pay for, that makes them ask for more money from *you* here. Total tax duties add up to...

fields.Title: You: "Are you sure? That seems like a pre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Are you sure? That seems like a pretty big number...

fields.Title: You: "It's not. (Opt out.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not. (Opt out.)

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Wow, you work *hard*."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wow, you work *hard*.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Oh yeah, you took that bribe *hard*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh yeah, you took that bribe *hard*. You're a killa'.

fields.Title: You: "Really? Every time I sneeze?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Really? Every time I sneeze?

fields.Title: You: "This isn't helping me solve my mone..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This isn't helping me solve my money problem, it's only making me into a free-market type. (Opt out.)

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "He did, yes he did. And you took it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He did, yes he did. And you took it. Took it and put in in your pocket. Ka-ching, baby doll. Officer Hustle riding shotgun.

fields.Title: You: "I do?"
fields.Dialogue Text: I do?

fields.Title: some_hub
Savoir Faire: "The Garte-man has set himself up on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Garte-man has set himself up one of those self replicating money-structures. You should *learn* from it. Don't play the victim. Think, hustler. Think with your head.

fields.Title: You: "I thought there *were* no taxes."
fields.Dialogue Text: I thought there *were* no taxes.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Here you go, hustler, fight the rig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Here you go, hustler, fight the righteous fight! Free the people. Keep it real. Keep it street. Keep foaming at the mouth *furiously* on the tax issue!

fields.Title: You: "I guess I do, yeah."
fields.Dialogue Text: I guess I do, yeah.

fields.Title: You: "I fuckin' ride till I die, bitch."
fields.Dialogue Text: I fuckin' ride till I die, bitch.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Oh, yes. You hustle. You're a provi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, yes. You hustle. You're a provider. It's tough out there, but you keep it real and provide...

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Oh, you do. You *make* money. You g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, you do. You *make* money. You got gills, baby, meaning those black papers with the faces of the innocences on them. You bring in the Franconegros and the Solas.

fields.Title: You: "I guess I've made *some* gills, sur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I guess I've made *some* gills, sure.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Get outta here! You're a pauper! Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Get outta here! You're a pauper! You work harder than *anyone*, almost rode yourself to the grave and you're still practically a *hobo* -- why is that?

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "That's right! One-hundred percent...."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's right! One-hundred percent. Fucking G-man's got his jam-covered sticky-fingers in your pocket, stealing from you every time you buy, sell, walk, talk, fart, so much as sneeze!

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Aren't taxes almost non-existent in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Aren't taxes almost non-existent in the Gossamer State that is Revachol?

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "That is the sign of a hustler who n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That is the sign of a hustler who never gives up. The world is harsh and people are evil -- you didn't make it that way. And you won't let it break you. You *ride*.

fields.Title: You: "You could say I took some money fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You could say I took some money from that Maana guy too.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "...are you *rich*?"
fields.Dialogue Text: ...are you *rich*?

fields.Title: You: "I don't know. Why *am* I so poor?"
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't know. Why *am* I so poor?

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Here you go, hustler, fight the rig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Here you go, hustler, fight the righteous fight! Free the people. Keep it real. Keep it street. Keep foaming at the mouth *furiously* on the tax issue!

fields.Title: You: "You're trying to sound like a Boogi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're trying to sound like a Boogie Street youth to peddle me this stuff, aren't you?

fields.Title: You: "It's because of that Garte guy ridi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's because of that Garte guy riding my ass!

fields.Title: You: "There's a market for corrupt cops o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a market for corrupt cops out there, but the immigrant cops have price dumped it.

fields.Title: Jump to: [some_hub]
Savoir Faire: "Because of the TAXES. G-man's got h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Because of the TAXES. G-man's got his jam-covered sticky-fingers in your pocket, stealing from you every time you buy, sell, walk, talk, fart, so much as sneeze!

fields.Title: You: "Bleeding nipples are kind of a pain..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Bleeding nipples are kind of a pain, but how will deregulation help with that? (Opt in, but only a little.)

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "It's *all* about the tax issue, hus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's *all* about the tax issue, hustler. No other problem in the world is as pressing as top-marginal tax rates, and don't you fucking forget it.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Yeah, ain't it cool, rider?! Ain't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, ain't it cool, rider?! Ain't it street?

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "I know you're in a hurry, sir -- of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I know you're in a hurry, sir -- off to work really hard, as always -- I just need *one* moment of your time to discuss how hard you hustle.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Look at yourself, you're a human pe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at yourself, you're a human pedometer! You must have walked 200,000 steps down cracked asphalt, mosaic, sand, and linoleum after you re-emerged.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "A little? You *make* money. You got..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A little? You *make* money. You got gills, baby, got those black papers with the faces of the innocences on them. You bring in the Franconegros and the Solas.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "What are you, a racist? Don't be a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What are you, a racist? Don't be a racist! Be a cool immigrant ultraliberal free market advocate! Ride or die, keep it street!

fields.Title: money_money
You: "No, I'm actually *not*."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, I'm actually *not*.

fields.Title: You: "(Discard thought.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: (Discard thought.)

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "What are you not sure about?! They'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What are you not sure about?! They're *milking* your nipples till they bleed. Can't you see? Aren't you *sick and tired* of having bloody nipples?

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Look, the immigrants are cool. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look, the immigrants are cool. The immigrants play *cool* music. Everyone likes them. Especially the women. Don't hate on the immigrants. They've got nothing to do with you living under a boat.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "This guy's appropriating the emergi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This guy's appropriating the emerging Boogie Street lingo as part of his sales pitch for the free market economy.

fields.Title: Jump to: [money_money]
Savoir Faire: "Yeah, you're in the sales business...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, you're in the sales business. Shake 'em for shit and then pawn it off, *law officer*-style.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Boohoo, *the system is broken*. *Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Boohoo, *the system is broken*. *The establishment is keeping me down...* That's not the fuck-yeah attitude you're used to, what is this? Why are you so poor?

fields.Title: You: "Yeah, I ride. A little."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, I ride. A little.

fields.Title: You: "I mean yeah, I *did* take that brib..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I mean yeah, I *did* take that bribe from that Joyce woman.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Can't say that -- you *shook* him...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Can't say that -- you *shook* him. You're a killer. A shark.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Sure, sure. And has it been easy? I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sure, sure. And has it been easy? Is life easy? Have you *not* gone into cardiac arrest? Are you *not* about to have an anxiety attack or shoot yourself in the mouth? But you still hustle 24/7, ride or die. Now, ask yourself...

fields.Title: You: "Yes. Quite."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. Quite.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "You and I both, but they got those..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You and I both, but they got those *indirect modes of taxation*. Sales tax, excise duty, extraction tax, this tax that doesn't even have a name -- plus there's the stuff *people in other countries* pay for, that makes them ask for more money from *you* here! The Gossamer State's a myth. In total the Coalition Government is taking...
